page.title: 07Leafield's Policeman & Vicar
page.content: P.C.Dawson is our village policeman. He serves Witney too. He lives in the police house with his wife aged 27, daughter,7, and 5 year old twins. He likes sport and takes Leafield boys for football and cricket. He plays football for Leafield. The Vicar. His name is Percy George Smith.His age is 74years.He has been at Leafield for 26years.He has grey hair,brown eyes and he wears glasses. At school he does Scripture and comes every Wednesday and tells us about God in assembly. In the church he gives services and lets us do plays in there at Christmas. He doesn't come out in the village very often so we don't see him much. He isn't married. He lives in a vicarage by the church.
